product_name: REI Tri-Top Fleece Hat with Chin Strap - Toddler Boys'
long_description: Extending down to protect little ears, the REI Tri-Top fleece hat with chin strap for toddler boys offers plenty of warmth and fun styling. Warm, breathable fleece and fleece lining dry quickly, insulate even when wet and are easy to care for.
short_description: Extending down to protect little ears, the REI Tri-Top fleece hat with chin strap for toddler boys offers plenty of warmth and fun styling.
